== Description ==
Retrieve path of [[Templates|single template]] in current or parent template.

== Usage ==
%%%<?php get_single_template() ?>%%%

== Parameters ==
None.

== Return Values ==
; (string) : Result of <tt>get_query_template('single')</tt>.

Since: 1.5.0

<tt>get_single_template()</tt> is located in {{Trac|wp-includes/template.php}}.
